item.title: Welcome to the Bertha Blog
item.description: Hi you Welcome to my blog. I made it with Hugo platform and with github pages, to show my recents projects in the intern in Paris and the university. Show my medium post, and futher my travel adventures. Hope you like it ;)

About me Computer Engineer Student that love the sociology and impact of the tech into the society. Came from the Pura Vida land, love to move, Always going into nice and enriching adventures CV Mobile application developer in GoTouch Team in the Computer Research Laboratory, TEC, Costa Rica | [July 2017 - Present] | Look More

item.description: Medium Post La Costa Rica que no tiene agua potable Perderle el miedo a un no Pytheas as a tool to get youtube data Web scrapping tutorial

item.title: Projects
item.description: Agroecology in the digital age To realize a digital enquiry of the agroecological turn in Costa Rica, and more largely in Central America through the setup of consistent and appropriated datasets in order to analize the production and circulation of knowledge through different channels of social-media Los Juegos Universitarios Costarricenses Create an application with realtime streaming of all the games of JUNCOS more than 9 sport disciplines, with notifications, favorites, and results.

item.title: Traveler
item.description: Travels Experiences Cuba Part of the voluntairs team of Cuba Conf Part of the team of Cuba Conf Womens Participations La Habana, Cuba One church, really old and pretty On big building in the Havana Another old building, I like the way of building resistance the time Gotouch or Gohome The blue beach in Varadero El Salvador One Volcano in one lake Good place for eat The best view of my life, Nicaragua at the bottom Same place but looking Honduras Another volcano near to San Miguel Software Libre over Central America Me making mistakes in the welcome moderation Germany Hamburg, Germany Workshop in Berlin with Corazon de Robota Berlin, Germany More famous place in Berlin, Germany Saint Pauli Trying to not fall down Mount Feldberg, Black Forest One more church in Essen, Germany Guatemala Tikal, Guatemala Castillo de San Felipe El remate, Guatemala I always feel little in this type of place Loving the lakes, Flores, Guatemala Semuc Champey, Guatemala Antigua, Guatemala Switzerland A colorfull watch, Geneve Another church Pretty colors trees One view in Geneve Another Lake
